name: projectionMatrix(for:viewportSize:zNear:zFar:)
desc: Returns a transform matrix appropriate for rendering 3D content to match the image captured by the camera, using the specified parameters.
declaration:
func projectionMatrix(for orientation: UIInterfaceOrientation, 
         viewportSize: CGSize, 
                zNear: CGFloat, 
                 zFar: CGFloat) -> simd_float4x4
